Package se.liu.ida.paperio

Class Tile

  • java.lang.Object
    • se.liu.ida.paperio.Tile
  • class Tile
extends java.lang.Object
    A tile in the game area. A tile has an x and y position, a color. It can also have a player as owner and a player as contested owner. A tiles color does depend on owner and contested owner.
